fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Convert somebody into a random non existing locust.
-Send a message to the entire town, consisting of up to 500 characters.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You bypass conversion immunity
-You may multitask
-If this is in game, every locust gains the win condition “Re-establish the locust empire!”

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!
